content: repeat 126 sts chart is on page 2 or follow written instructions la violette yarn & gift co horseshoe cable with left twist the cable horseshoe + left twist is done on 18 stitches and repeated 7 times repeat the 6 rounds a total of 7 times till you have 7 large cables and then knit round 1 - 3 ending on a cable round chart 1 chart 2 crown shaping starts after round 3 of chart 1 special stitches 2/2 lc sl 2 sts on cn hold in front k2 k2 from cn 2/2 rc sl 2 sts on cn hold in back k2 k2 from cn 3/3 lc sl 3 sts on cn hold in front k3 k3 from cn 3/3 rc sl 3 sts on cn hold in back k3 k3 from cn
